full_text: Pamper your princess with this sweet, soft little jacket and matching booties. (Lion Brand Yarn) Lion Brand Pattern #: 50678 PUBLISHED IN: Lion Brand Yarn Catalog - 2006 W SKILL LEVEL: Beginner + (Level 2) SIZE: One Size JACKET 6-12 months Finished Chest 17½ inches (44.5 cm) Length 7 inches (18 cm) BOOTIES 6 months Length 3½ inches (9 cm) (A) #270 Lion Cashmere Blend Yarn (336 yards) (B) #260 Tiffany Yarn (137 yards) Both yarns have been discontinued Knitting Needles - Size 9 (5.5 mm) Size 7 (4.5 mm) 24” (60 cm) circular needle Split Ring Stitch Markers Stitch Holders 1 yd (1 m) of 5⁄8 inch (16 mm) pink ribbon (optional) Gauge: Jacket: 20 sts + 36 rows = 4” (10 cm in Seed st with A. Booties: 23 sts = 4” (10 cm) in Garter st (knit every row) with 2 strands of B held together Jacket is worked back and forth using circular needle to accommodate large number of stitches. Sweater is worked from the top down. Bootie is worked with 2 strands of B held together. Cuff is worked with 1 strand of A. Construction schematics are provided. Suitable for girls or boys depending on color chosen.
name: Ravelry: Pretty in Pink Knit Jacket and Booties pattern by Lion Brand Yarn
